items.title: StickyWindows themes configuration
items.description: Schema describing the sticky windows themes in Glue42 Desktop

displayName.description: The user friendly name of the theme which will be displayed

properties.title: StickyWindows theme properties configuration
properties.description: Schema describing the themes in Sticky Windows

titleHeight.description: The height of the window header when the window is extracted from a workspace.

titleFontWeight.description: The font weight of the window title

focusTitleFontWeight.description: The font weight of a focused window title

titleFontSize.description: The font size of a window title

titleSeparatorHeight.description: Height (in px) of the title separator.

frameThickness.description: Thickness of the frame of a window group.

singleFrameVisible.description: Specifies whether the single window frame is visible.

frameColor.description: Single window and window group frame color.

borderSize.description: The border size of flat and tab windows.

borderColor.description: The border color of flat and tab windows

opacityClicked.description: Group border opacity when it is clicked on.

animatedBorders.description: If `true`, the approaching edges and the borders of dragged single windows will be animated.

foregroundColor.description: The default foreground color of all Glue42 window elements.

backgroundColor.description: The default background color of all Glue42 Window elements (e.g., loading animation background, etc.)

loadingAnimation.description: Specifies an external XAML file containing a user-defined loading animation.

headerColor.description: Changes the color of the background behind the tabs in a tab group.

tabColor.description: Changes the color of a tab that is not active or hovered over.

tabTextColor.description: Changes the color of the text in a tab when the tab is not active or hovered over.

activeTabColor.description: Changes the color of the active tab in a tab group.

activeTabTextColor.description: Changes the text color of the active tab in a tab group.

activeTabBorderColor.description: Changes the border color of an active tab. Defaults to the inactive tab border color

activeTabBorderSize.description: Changes the border size of an active tab. Defaults to the inactive tab border size

activeTabCaptionScale.description: Changes the caption scale of an active tab. Defaults to the inactive tab caption scale

activeTabTextSize.description: Changes the size of the text of the active tab. Defaults to the active tab caption scale

activeTabTextFontWeight.description: Changes the text font weight of an active tab. Defaults to the inactive tab text font weight

hoverTabColor.description: Changes the color of the tab when it is hovered over and is not active.

hoverTabTextColor.description: Changes the text color of a tab when it is hovered over and is not active.

tabBorderColor.description: Changes the color of the tab border regardless of the tab state.

headerHeight.description: Defines the height of the tab header.

tabOffset.description: The distance from the top left edge of the tab group for tabs.

tabLeftOffset.description: The distance from left edge of the tab group for tabs. Defaults to TabOffset.

tabTopOffset.description: The distance from top edge of the tab group for tabs. Defaults to TabOffset.

tabMargin.description: The distance between tabs in a tab group.

minimumTabSize.description: The minimum width of a tab.

tabBorderSize.description: The size of the border around a tab. It behaves like padding, so the tab item does not enlarge.

tabCaptionScale.description: The ratio between the size of a tab and the caption in it.

textFontWeight.description: The font weight of the text in a tab. Defaults to Regular

tabTextSize.description: The font size of the text in a tab. Defaults to the tab caption scale

tabCloseButtonSize.description: The size of the close button on each tab.

buttonOffset.description: The difference between the height of a tab and the height of the tab group buttons.

buttonMargin.description: The distance between the tab group buttons.

flatWhenSingle.description:
When `true`, the tab window will look as a flat window (without a tab header) when it is single.
            Tabs will appear automatically when you add one or more tab windows to it.

headerButtonsForegroundColor.description: The foreground color of the buttons in the header of a tab group.

headerButtonsBackgroundColor.description: The background color of the buttons in the header of a tab group.

headerButtonsGroupBackgroundColor.description: The background color of all buttons in the header of a tab group. (Visible when there is a margin between the tab header buttons.)

headerButtonsHoverForegroundColor.description: The foreground color of the buttons in the header of a tab group when they are hovered over.

headerButtonsHoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color of the buttons in the header of a tab group when they are hovered over.

activeTabHoverColor.description: The background color of an active and hovered tab. Defaults to the active color

activeTabHoverTextColor.description: The foreground/text color of an active and hovered tab. Defaults to the active color

backgroundColor.description: The background color of the buttons in the header of a tab group.

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color of the buttons in the header of a tab group.

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color of the buttons in the header of a tab group when they are hovered over.

hoverForegroundColor.description: The foreground color of the buttons in the header of a tab group when they are hovered over.

groupBackgroundColor.description: The background color of all buttons in the header of a tab group. (Visible when there is a margin between the tab header buttons.)

iconSize.description: The size of the icon of the buttons

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color for the close  button of a tab group. Defaults to tab buttons foreground color; path - .tabs.headerButtons

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color for the close  button when hovered. Defaults to tab buttons hover background color; path - .tabs.headerButtons

hoverForegroundColor.description: The background color for the close  button when hovered. Defaults to tab buttons hover background color; path - .tabs.headerButtons

tooltip.description: The text which appears in the tooltip when the close button is hovered. Defaults to "Close". To remove the tooltip pass an empty string - ""

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color for the maximize button of a tab group. Defaults to tab buttons foreground color; path - .tabs.headerButtons

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color for the maximize button when hovered. Defaults to tab buttons hover background color; path - .tabs.headerButtons

hoverForegroundColor.description: The background color for the maximize button when hovered. Defaults to tab buttons hover background color; path - .tabs.headerButtons

tooltip.description: The text which appears in the tooltip when the maximize button is hovered. Defaults to "Maximize". To remove the tooltip pass an empty string - ""

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color for the minimize button of a tab group. Defaults to tab buttons foreground color; path - .tabs.headerButtons

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color for the minimize button when hovered. Defaults to tab buttons hover background color; path - .tabs.headerButtons

hoverForegroundColor.description: The background color for the minimize button when hovered. Defaults to tab buttons hover background color; path - .tabs.headerButtons

tooltip.description: The text which appears in the tooltip when the minimize button is hovered. Defaults to "Minimize". To remove the tooltip pass an empty string - ""

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color for the restore button of a tab group. Defaults to tab buttons foreground color; path - .tabs.headerButtons

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color for the restore button when hovered. Defaults to tab buttons hover background color; path - .tabs.headerButtons

hoverForegroundColor.description: The background color for the restore button when hovered. Defaults to tab buttons hover background color; path - .tabs.headerButtons

tooltip.description: The text which appears in the tooltip when the restore button is hovered. Defaults to "Restore". To remove the tooltip pass an empty string - ""

color.description: The color of the close button in a tab . Defaults to tabTextColor in the tabs section.

hoverColor.description: The color of the close button in a tab when hovered. Defaults to tabTextColor in the tabs section.

tooltip.description: The text which appears in the tooltip when the close button in a tab is hovered. Defaults to "Close". To remove the tooltip pass an empty string - ""

backgroundColor.description: The background color of the window buttons. Defaults to the base property backgroundColor

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color of the window buttons. Defaults to the base property foregroundColor

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color of the window buttons when hovered. Defaults to the base property foregroundColor

hoverForegroundColor.description: The foreground color of the window buttons when hovered. Defaults to the base property backgroundColor

iconSize.description: The size of the icon of the button

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color for the close button of a window. Defaults to window buttons foreground color; path - buttons

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color for the close button when hovered. Defaults to window buttons hover background color; path - buttons

hoverForegroundColor.description: The background color for the close button when hovered. Defaults to window buttons hover background color; path - buttons

tooltip.description: The text which appears in the tooltip when the close button is hovered. Defaults to "Close". To remove the tooltip pass an empty string - ""

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color for the maximize button of a window. Defaults to window buttons foreground color; path - buttons

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color for the maximize button when hovered. Defaults to window buttons hover background color; path - buttons

hoverForegroundColor.description: The background color for the maximize button when hovered. Defaults to window buttons hover background color; path - buttons

tooltip.description: The text which appears in the tooltip when the maximize button is hovered. Defaults to "Maximize". To remove the tooltip pass an empty string - ""

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color for the minimize button of a window. Defaults to window buttons foreground color; path - buttons

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color for the minimize button when hovered. Defaults to window buttons hover background color; path - buttons

hoverForegroundColor.description: The background color for the minimize button when hovered. Defaults to window buttons hover background color; path - buttons

tooltip.description: The text which appears in the tooltip when the minimize button is hovered. Defaults to "Minimize". To remove the tooltip pass an empty string - ""

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color for the restore button of a window. Defaults to window buttons foreground color; path - buttons

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color for the restore button when hovered. Defaults to window buttons hover background color; path - buttons

hoverForegroundColor.description: The background color for the restore button when hovered. Defaults to window buttons hover background color; path - buttons

tooltip.description: The text which appears in the tooltip when the restore button is hovered. Defaults to "Restore". To remove the tooltip pass an empty string - ""

headerHeight.description: The height of the group header. The default is 25

titleSize.description: The size of the title in the group header. The default is 15.0

titleFontWeight.description: The font weight of the title in the group header. The default is Normal

focusTitleFontWeight.description: The font weight of the group title when the group is focused. Defaults to the value of titleFontWeight

backgroundColor.description: The background color of the group buttons. Defaults to the base level backgroundColor

foregroundColor.description: The foregroundColor color of the group buttons. Defaults to the base level textColor

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The backgroundColor color of the group buttons when hovered. Defaults to the base level textColor

hoverForegroundColor.description: The foreground color of the group buttons when hovered. Defaults to the base level frameColor

rightOffset.description: Changes the right offset of the group buttons

iconSize.description: The size of the icon of the buttons

backgroundColor.description: The background color for the close button of a group. Defaults to group buttons background color; path - group.buttons

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color for the close button of a group. Defaults to group buttons foreground color; path - group.buttons

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color for the close button when hovered. Defaults to group buttons hover background color; path - group.buttons

hoverForegroundColor.description: The background color for the close button when hovered. Defaults to group buttons hover background color; path - group.buttons

tooltip.description: The text which appears in the tooltip when the close button is hovered. Defaults to "Close". To remove the tooltip pass an empty string - ""

backgroundColor.description: The background color for the maximize button of a group. Defaults to group buttons background color; path - group.buttons

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color for the maximize button of a group. Defaults to group buttons foreground color; path - group.buttons

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color for the maximize button when hovered. Defaults to group buttons hover background color; path - group.buttons

hoverForegroundColor.description: The background color for the maximize button when hovered. Defaults to group buttons hover background color; path - group.buttons

tooltip.description: The text which appears in the tooltip when the maximize button is hovered. Defaults to "Maximize". To remove the tooltip pass an empty string - ""

backgroundColor.description: The background color for the minimize button of a group. Defaults to group buttons background color; path - group.buttons

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color for the minimize button of a group. Defaults to group buttons foreground color; path - group.buttons

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color for the minimize button when hovered. Defaults to group buttons hover background color; path - group.buttons

hoverForegroundColor.description: The background color for the minimize button when hovered. Defaults to group buttons hover background color; path - group.buttons

tooltip.description: The text which appears in the tooltip when the minimize button is hovered. Defaults to "Minimize". To remove the tooltip pass an empty string - ""

backgroundColor.description: The background color for the restore button of a group. Defaults to group buttons background color; path - group.buttons

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color for the restore button of a group. Defaults to group buttons foreground color; path - group.buttons

hoverBackgroundColor.description: The background color for the restore button when hovered. Defaults to group buttons hover background color; path - group.buttons

hoverForegroundColor.description: The background color for the restore button when hovered. Defaults to group buttons hover background color; path - group.buttons

tooltip.description: The text which appears in the tooltip when the restore button is hovered. Defaults to "Restore". To remove the tooltip pass an empty string - ""

topWindowBorderSize.description: The size of the top Swimlane window border. It does not include the title height.

topWindowTitleHeight.description: The height of the title in the top Swimlane window.

topWindowTextSize.description: The size of the title text in the top Swimlane window.

splitterSize.description: Changes the thickness of the Swimlane splitter.

splitterDragBorderSize.description: Size of the Swimlane splitter when dragged.

minElementSize.description: The minimum height and width of Swimlane rows/columns.

topWindowBackgroundColor.description: The background color of the top Swimlane window.

topWindowForegroundColor.description: The color of text and buttons on the top Swimlane window.

laneBackgroundColor.description: Changes the background color of empty Swimlanes.

splitterColor.description: Changes the color of the Swimlane splitter.

splitterHoverColor.description: Changes the color of the splitter (without the drag borders) when hovered over.

splitterHoverBorderColor.description: Changes the drag borders color when the splitter is hovered over.

splitterDragColor.description: Changes the color of the splitter (without the drag borders) when the splitter is being dragged.

splitterDragBorderColor.description: Changes the color of the dragging borders when the splitter is being dragged.

headerSize.description: Changes the header size of a tab extracted from a workspace.

headerColor.description: Changes the header background color of Swimlane tabs.

size.description: Changes the size of a Swimlane tab.

minSize.description: Sets the minimum width of a Swimlane tab.

buttonsOffset.description: Changes the left offset of the Swimlane tabs and the top left offset of workspace tabs and the "Add workspace" button.

margin.description: The offset of both worskspace tabs and Swimlane tabs from the top of the header.

borderSize.description: Thickness of the border around Swimlane tabs.

closeButtonSize.description: The "Close" button size of Swimlane tabs.

innerMargin.description: Left and right margin for the text and the "Close" button of Swimlane tabs and for the text in workspace tabs.

borderColor.description: The color of the border around inactive Swimlane tabs.

color.description: The color of inactive Swimlane tabs.

textColor.description: The color of the buttons and titles of inactive Swimlane tabs.

hoverColor.description: The color of inactive Swimlane tabs when hovered over.

hoverTextColor.description: The color of the text and the "Close" button of inactive Swimlane tabs when hovered over.

activeBorderColor.description: The color of the border of the active Swimlane tab.

activeColor.description: The color of the active Swimlane tab.

activeTextColor.description: The color of the text and the "Close" button of the active Swimlane tab.

headerColor.description: The color of the workspace header.

size.description: The width of the workspace tab.

borderSize.description: The thickness of the border around a Swimlane workspace.

closeButtonSize.description: The size of the "Close" button of a workspace tab.

newButtonSize.description: The size of the "Add workspace" button.

newButtonMargin.description: The distance between workspace tabs and the "Add workspace" button.

newButtonColor.description: The color of the "Add workspace" button when it is not hovered over.

newButtonBorderColor.description: The border color of the "Add workspace" button regardless of the button state.

newButtonTextColor.description: The color of the text in the "Add workspace" button when the button is not hovered over.

innerMargin.description: The left and right margin of text and buttons in a workspace tab.

borderColor.description: The color of the border around a workspace tab.

color.description: The color of inactive workspace tabs.

textColor.description: The color of text and icons in inactive workspace tabs.

hoverColor.description: The color of an inactive workspace tab when it is hovered over.

hoverTextColor.description: The color of the text of an inactive workspace tab when it is hovered over.

activeBorderColor.description: The border color of the active workspace tab.

activeColor.description: The color of the active workspace tab.

activeTextColor.description: The color of the text of the active workspace tab.
